sentences.en: A flagpole loomed up through the mist.
sentences.cn: 在薄雾中隐隐可见一根旗杆.

sentences.en: Great Godfrey! Uncle Willie is sitting on top of the flagpole.
sentences.cn: 乖乖! 威利叔叔坐在旗竿上了.

sentences.en: Hoist the Chinese flag on the flagpole, please!
sentences.cn: 请在旗杆上升起中国国旗!

sentences.en: In 1992, Air Jordan Shoes , Frank Perkings in Los Angeles attempt on the world flagpole - sitting record.
sentences.cn: 1992年, 洛杉矶的弗兰克?帕金斯决心打破坐旗杆的世界记录,其实我就是那个演员. ..

sentences.en: In 1992, Frank Perkins of Los Angeles made an attempt on the world flagpole - sitting record.
sentences.cn: 1992年, 洛杉矶的弗兰克·柏金斯决心打破坐旗杆的世界记录.

sentences.en: Oracle bone script , flagpole with flying streamers.
sentences.cn: 甲骨文字形,中象旗杆,上下有旌旗和飘带, 旗杆正中竖立.

sentences.en: Parents have left candles , incense and offerings of fruit by the flagpole.
sentences.cn: 遇难学生的家长在旗杆旁留下了香烛和水果等祭祀品.

sentences.en: Pull the flagpole out of the ground, and down.
sentences.cn: 把旗杆拔出, 然后平放在地上.

sentences.en: The flagpole tapered off to a point.
sentences.cn: 那支旗竿逐渐变细成尖头.

sentences.en: The flagpole toppled over and a crane had to be used to erect it.
sentences.cn: 旗杆倒下了,必须用起重机将它扶直.

sentences.en: The ground was horizontal to the flagpole.
the idea was first run up the flagpole in 1997.
The new Namibian flag was hoisted up the flagpole.
sentences.cn: 纳米比亚的新国旗被升到旗杆顶上。

sentences.en: There is a flagpole broken by wind on the building.
sentences.cn: 大厦上有个被风折断的旗杆.

sentences.en: Unfold the flag first, and then hoist it quickly the the flagpole.
sentences.cn: 应先使它展开, 然后快速把它升至旗杆.

sentences.en: Weren't you supposed to wait for me at the flagpole?
sentences.cn: 你不是应该在那个旗杆上等我的 吗 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 试验，检验：检验（一项计划、建议、草案或想法）并估量对它的反应

phrases.phrase: run something up the flagpole (to see who salutes)
phrases.tran_cn: 测试对（新观点，新建议）的认可度；试行（新办法，新建议）

trans.tran_en: a tall pole on which a flag hangs
